body:
## Fix
* 9d3e62e fix: fix closing mutex handle by @Bush2021
* aacc0a7 fix: skip redundant operations when `GetLaunchOn[Startup/Exit]` are empty by @Bush2021
* d349789 fix: use process ID in mutex name to avoid conflicts by @Bush2021

## Notice
`launch_on_exit` causes the IDM floating bar to not display (#130). Please avoid using it until a better method is implemented.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/compare/1.11.0...1.11.1

## New
* 603b5e9 feat: allow `none` as a value for `data_dir` and `cache_dir` to use the browser's default path by @Bush2021
* aca6eed feat: add launch on startup and exit functionality with first run detection (#115) (#117) by @Bush2021

## Maintenance
* 4340518 chore: add a description to the INI file by @Bush2021
* 7d6903c chore: update submodules by @Bush2021
* ab0eb43 refactor: replace `ReplaceStringIni` with `ReplaceStringInPlace` for consistency by @Bush2021
* d05ee87 docs: improve clarity and formatting by @Bush2021
* f44236b chore: add issue templates for bug reports and feature requests by @Bush2021

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/compare/1.10.0...1.11.0

## New * https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/a0379693e174b6dc78bebc4ac85d6f25e2efd975 feat: add a switch for showing password without verification * https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/7008f30327242d7f091a6f4c83b3535c6f2c602c feat: add a switch for forcibly enabling win32k * https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/e30cee8ee78f66bf7016039df6f9901066cf62c6 feat!: update INI section names and keys for consistency ## Fix * https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/9492f007af301aba8f7f1f6a9dfce609f2842035 fix: update GetTopContainerView to use GetFocus() * https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/3cf8f816167b0608049550ed16fdf6abb469546d fix: return the original function when lpVolumeSerialNumber is nullptr (#101) ## Maintenance * https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/fd6271767064e9a6ceeb2e387a4b59a82ddec9dd docs: add explanation of conditions under which new_tab_disable_name takes effect in INI examples * https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/0d7967cdde705288f9973e5a8364eef2b3bd2c44 chore: remove unnecessary debug logs in green.h and pakpatch.h * https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/0d7967cdde705288f9973e5a8364eef2b3bd2c44 chore: remove unused hard patch * https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/f2eafb2eed7f675b0cc1c258c211d29d6d1180ee chore: removes logic that detects the existence of INI files * https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/e0c94df2a26ff977256a17b646505947023e256e chore: move utility functions to utils.h * https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/2e2c019204c0da58e26c69cce90b31d4e5e98213 chore: improve boss key logic to avoid hiding other windows with similar class names (#104) ## Notice * Regarding the print preview failure, this issue is not caused by Chrome++. Users can add the command line parameter `--disable-features=PrintCompositorLPAC` as a temporary solution. For more details, see: #85 * This release introduces ARM64 support and has been tested on an virtual machine. But please note that this is still an experimental effort, so please use with caution. Issues related to this may be reported in #88. Help from anyone with ARM64 development experience would be appreciated. * Some INI key values have been added or modified, and the old key values will be deprecated soon. It is recommended to use a text comparison tool to compare the changes and migrate to the new key values as soon as possible. **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/compare/1.9.0...1.10.0

## New
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/fd0f7b264e2522e4891416c745109dc8483ce2d0 feat: replace hook library to support arm64

## Fix
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/b20439680945cd5b51bdb2918e29616a3c223327 fix: reimplement `IsOnBookmark` to fix https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/issues/93
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/085aca9934d81d2cdea2fa62e902ecff26de3e75 fix: quick clicking on close button triggers double-click close command

## Maintenance
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/4f38e7c2286b8d0202fff777b369818a74a32705 chore: replace macro definitions with enums
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/8a86f66cb893fcc5e313743b2ff409e1b32294f4 chore: remove unused incremental traversal
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/917361ad663de331a7e6bbdb5b4e8c3641fff77a chore: extract common logic code
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/4be523d25308e65b72915d8da491cbb708aa8a83 refactor: replace `InstallJMP` with detours to support ARM64

## Notice
* Regarding the print preview failure, this issue is not caused by Chrome++. Users can add the command line parameter `--disable-features=PrintCompositorLPAC` as a temporary solution. For more details, see: #85
* This release introduces ARM64 support and has been tested on an virtual machine. But please note that this is still an experimental effort, so please use with caution. Issues related to this may be reported in #88. Help from anyone with ARM64 development experience would be appreciated.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/compare/1.8.9...1.9.0

name: 1.9.0-alpha
body:
Windows ARM64 users, please test this version to see if it works correctly. Please provide feedback in #88 whether it works or not.

Other users willing to test, please check if the version suitable for your architecture has any broken functionality; if so, please open a separate issue for feedback.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/compare/1.8.9...1.9.0-alpha

## Fix
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/f776715153e110e4cc5b58722cc68a3e6813e03c fix: mouse events on find-in-page bar incorrectly triggered closure of the bar

## Notice
* Regarding the print preview failure, this issue is not caused by Chrome++. Users can add the command line parameter `--disable-features=PrintCompositorLPAC` as a temporary solution. For more details, see: #85

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/compare/1.8.8...1.8.9

## Fix
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/434d109ecc12911295321e9d30b23c368bee3108 Revert "fix: disable win32k lockdown to properly load DLLs (#68)"
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/8f3ac7f97536fc7d31f65df40fae96f05c0d5229 fix: disable WinSboxNoFakeGdiInit using command line (#76)
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/1f9490e9fd0628fd69ebcfdcaac455ae5e8e9ce6 fix: try to resolve the full-screen detection error in multi-monitor setups

## Maintenance
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/ca4a491418999d561c146ee4af74063fffccc108 chore: address compile-time warnings
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/090959e1dd600237ec2525c19715fa11b76298e7 chore: minor adjustments
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/ec6735d52264f748cc979ac8ef7363c1759e242b chore: update submodules


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/compare/1.8.7...1.8.8

## Fix
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/dcde2e927a9e36805480d2ebe23f491241514336 fix: disable win32k lockdown to properly load DLLs (#68)
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/8baa434a544c7e830dcd6d253cf6f90ef13c386e fix: avoid returning 1 from `HandleDoubleClick`
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/7949a6123bd2666a4cd02fb1f0eb22aa4c80ee51 fix: modify the key release sequence in `SendKey` and discard `SendKeys` (#73)

## Maintenance
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/c41f6473f8355d35d0b8b6ff4f6f85a794b0e6c2 chore: remove `--force-renderer-accessibility`
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/b29bdecfdf6de408aa46e48deff17f27f7383e57 chore: translate and standardize comments into English
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/9bcdb1ee2b5c473875e35f3771830c7dc3935e89 refactor: consolidate find-in-page handling into a separate function
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/80561dce78413cb20b5651686ce6608555d55eca chore: revert some change and translate some comments
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/2d42777bb0782ddb441be92e26bf347fdedbdfa7 refactor: new implementation for sending key combinations
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/982095b3021e78268362d486c524d259dc87cd93 chore: optimize the logic for `IsNeedKeep` (#72)
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/bc503cf4f924ab56bc0f43175bfbab1b365667b0 refactor: replace `__int64` with `int` of `GetTabCount`
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/865cce36cacb6e2770a0e73dc1458b68d7b128d1 refactor: `wstring_to_string`
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/501b0c8db7ec6f19b1170809766118e9d710d29f chore: directly return false in `IsDocNewTab` without a required startup parameter
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/d28fe91507fb70c0297918ddea5a8ce7092eb92d style: reformat using Chromium style
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/91bef9dff02730634f86ceab3f027000052c8f9f refactor: refactor `MouseProc`
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/07c466cb0868488adb164caa8e7ed5d37a98329f chore: update actions


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/compare/1.8.6...1.8.7

name: 1.8.7-alpha
body:
`version-alpha-dcde2e9.7z` is used to test #68

`version-alpha-30b9594.7z` is used to test #69

## Fix
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/d96ffd071b58c0fc10f540e7503e99dcd49f81a3 fix `keep_last_tab=0` not working

## Maintenance
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/6173a254325700783a6b43d34fa8b9b0ad5a70e8 chore: remove useless parameters
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/617c0284d973b3e14486c13ea255599bf91366fd chore: organize code in utils.h
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/c519efe85f85533feb9d98cc2eb8d963c1c9b850 chore: optimize tab closure and reservation for fullscreen and find-in-page mode
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/32c296f3992746a6edb7cb2390d19ebab4ae29a9 chore: optimize `handleOpenUrlNewTab`
* https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/commit/4ab3a4b25b9c27847f5a01cda39cf0f4902975ef chore: optimize handling of tab closure in find-in-page mode

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Bush2021/chrome_plus/compare/1.8.5...1.8.6
